name: Habitat Hullabaloo
description:
Press F11 to enter fullscreen for an optimal experience while playing

Team Goothe - Design Week Winter 2022

A game where you have to escape the aliens that have trapped you in their terrarium.

Controls

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Camera

Space - Jump

E - Interact

Team Members

Kevin Jacob Stanly - Programmer

Justin Power - Programmer

Lucas Diab - Designer/Artist

Hejie Tian - Designer/Artist

Tiggi Pengelly - Designer/Artist

Tim Yang  - Designer

Lucas Kloberdanz-Dyck - Designer

The Windows download contains higher quality lighting with post-processing!
